title: 107_s916
content: Children First Child Support Reform Act of 2001 - Amends parts A (TANF) and D of title IV of the Social Security Act to: (1) modify the rule requiring assignment of support rights as a condition of receiving TANF, (2) increase child support payments to families, (3) revise child support distribution rules. And (4) change from mandatory to discretionary the authority of States to retain certain support rights assignments after a certain date .
